Description: Fragment of double handle from a Koan pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-brown; some mica. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Name Sopatros. cf. Grace, V., 'Stamped amphora handles' in H. Colt (ed.), Excavations at Nessana 1 (London 1962) 1962, 124-5. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 200, 50?
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0084)
